title: Senior Software Engineer
education: Master Degree Information Systems and Technologies, Software engineer
profile_summary: Software engineer with 7+ years of commercial experience in backend and full-stack development. Hands-on expertise building AI-powered systems using Python, FastAPI, OpenAI APIs, LlamaIndex, and pgvector, focused on LLM-based document processing, RAG pipelines, and multi-agent orchestration. Experienced with NLP integration (Whisper, DeepFace) for multimodal use cases, PostgreSQL, scalable architectures (MVC, Clean Architecture), mentoring small agile teams, and translating business requirements into GenAI solutions.

projects_experience.project_title: NDA - Multi-agent system integrated with Jira/Confluence/GitLab and corporate chats
projects_experience.overview: Multi-agent system that monitors project status in real time, enables contextual search via RAG from project chat, validates custom rules and escalates issues to management when conditions are not met.
responsibilities: Developed backend features for multi-agent task validation, contextual search, and chat interaction
Integrated OpenAI APIs and SmolAgents into multi-agent workflows
Implemented API integrations with Jira, GitLab, and Confluence for real-time project sync
Built RAG components using LlamaIndex and pgvector for semantic search
Used Apache Tika for document parsing and indexing in the retrieval pipeline
Collaborated with architect on database modeling and migration scripts
Participated in code reviews and contributed to internal documentation and onboarding materials
Participated in team planning sessions and technical discussions

projects_experience.project_title: NDA - App for public schools and kindergartens (video analysis)
projects_experience.overview: Application to analyze lesson video recordings for parameters like lesson start/end, emotional background, profanity, and generate reports on lesson quality.
responsibilities: Defined database structure for efficient, scalable storage
Implemented Celery tasks and backend logic for asynchronous video processing
Integrated OpenAI Whisper for speech recognition and DeepFace for facial emotion analysis
Used vLLM to interpret transcribed content and extract contextual insights
Handled RTSP stream ingestion and video segmentation logic
Created and maintained internal documentation, participated in code reviews and planning

projects_experience.project_title: AI-powered Financial Analysis and Recommendation System
projects_experience.overview: Cloud AI system for financial advisors and wealth managers using ML to process content feeds in real-time to boost productivity for wealth management, commercial banking, and fund distribution.
projects_experience.role: Senior Software Engineer / Lead Software Engineer
responsibilities: Incorporated content-based recommender model
Implemented performant RESTful API endpoints and complex database queries
Implemented business rules and import tasks
Collaborated with business teams and other engineering teams; designed subsystems and large features
Set up monitoring with ELK, Sentry, and Azure Monitor; participated in code reviews and documentation

projects_experience.project_title: Web application for teachers - automated assessment
projects_experience.overview: Application that scans students' handwriting, automatically grades papers, allows test creation and scanning via smartphone, and provides automated grading and reporting.
responsibilities: Communicated directly with customer to clarify requirements and implementation options
Implemented functionality related to generation and PDF blank generation using LaTeX
Designed architecture and documentation; provided product support and bug fixes
Integrated RedSMS for automated SMS/voice notifications and prepared PoC for Twilio migration
Developed and updated unit tests

projects_experience.overview: Custom platform providing dashboards for visualizing large amounts of financial data for banks and financial institutions with real-time monitoring and dynamic graphs.
responsibilities: Integrated with ML-based solution via REST API and WebSockets
Prepared and edited datasets, implemented interfaces to trigger and monitor model training
Collaborated with frontend developers and designed architecture and documentation
Provided product support, bug fixes, and feature implementation

projects_experience.overview: Feature to generate Slack channel activity reports for enterprise users, including metrics like member counts, deleted/archived channels, guest accounts, etc.
responsibilities: Communicated with client to clarify requirements
Researched Slack API for Enterprise users and prepared integration plan/architecture
Worked with Slack bot, slash commands, modals, and events; created endpoints and services to collect data and generate reports
